text.ops: Locate the rightmost point on the line chart to find the latest date, August 31, with an Attendance of 34518.
text.ops2: Locate the leftmost point on the line chart to find the earliest date, August 1, with an Attendance of 34471.
text.last: With both the latest (34518) and earliest (34471) attendance values highlighted, compute their difference: 34518 minus 34471 equals 47.
